content: coaster set introduction thank you for selecting my coaster pattern set - the perfect table decoration i hope that working on the coasters brings you a lot of joy i tried making all of the instructions clear and understandable but in case of any doubts feel free to dm me have fun and of course check out my other products at madebylisek etsy com you can also follow my instagram @madeby__lisek to get all the latest updates and behind-the- scenes photos materials time 15-30 minutes each coaster this tutorial yarn / rope difficulty 2/5 crochet hook scissors us terms suggestions of colors and hook sizes description of yarn fibre 85% cotton | 15% polyester thickness worsted/aran yardage/meterage 246 yds | 225m grams 250g material yarnart macrame note both parts coaster and the cotton 788 - 2mm holder are made with 3 5 mm hook hook 3 5 mm final size coaster coaster box diameter 11 cm / 4 33 in diameter 12 5 cm / 5 in height 5 cm / 2 in single coaster graph symbols abbreviations chain - chain flo - front loop only slip_stitch - slip_stitch blo - back loop only single_crochet - single_crochet tlo - third loop only double_crochet - double_crochet mc - magic_ring ij - invisible join* mij - mod invisible join* *described on the next page written pattern - single coaster round 0 mc round 1 single_crochet chain as first double_crochet chain double_crochet chain x7 slip_stitch blo total 16 chains included round 2 single_crochet chain as first double_crochet chain double_crochet in the same chain space chain double_crochet chain double_crochet in the same chain space chain x 7 slip_stitch blo total 32 chains included round 3 single_crochet chain as a first double_crochet double_crochet in the same chain space double_crochet in the double_crochet from the previous round double_crochet 2 in chain space from previous round x15 double_crochet in the double_crochet from previous round mij* described on the next page total 48 chains included round 4 slip_stitch flo around your coaster ij * described on the next page written pattern -
